misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
Finally made his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after 20 years of trying.
biography: Harri, affectionately known in golfing circles as "the doctor", is a celebrated veteran of the Hattula Golf club. With a personality as vibrant as his attire, Harri brings an infectious enthusiasm to every tournament, and is a constant source of entertainment to his many fans.

Despite his advanced age, Harri remains a formidable presence on the course, renowned for his bomb drives that defy expectations and consistently wow the crowds. His dedication to the sport is undeniable, marked by persistence and grit.

Harri has participated in 5 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, securing the coveted Hector Trophée on two occasions. While the Victor Trophy has so far eluded him, Harri's competitive spirit remains as strong as ever, and his fans are eagerly anticipating the next Hector Trophée in 2025, which will be his sixth appearance.

In a moment of triumph celebrated by golfers far and wide, Harri finally achieved his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after two decades of relentless pursuit. This milestone is a testament to his unwavering commitment to the sport and serves as an inspiration to golfers of all skill levels.
